name: Vexzy - Demo
description:
-Story-

          Once upon a time in the Peaceful world. The time was seal by the Magician. Monsters come out to destroy everything and any life. You are the one who can release the time and defend the world from the monster but you can't fight alone. Help the egg and they will be your help you.

         Adventures with your allies, find the key and release the world.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-How to play!-

         Hatch the egg! Fight the enemy!! Collect all the key, find the door and go to the next map. Adventure to the new world and help a little egg from a monsters. There are waiting for you!!!

-Control- Mouses

         - Left Click Attack (x2 Combo 1, x3 Combo 2)

Keyboard

         - W, A, S, D Movement

         - Left Shift Run

         - F Interact/Hatch the Egg

         - Spacebar Jump (x2 Double Jump) 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy!

**Updat**

- Fix sound

- Fix UI text
